name: Ignatz Dogfight
description:
From the way-back glory days of Codea, when we didn’t have no newfangled Craft API and we had to make every single mesh vertex by hand AND WE LIKED IT THAT WAY. :)

ignatz did some impressive magic here, though it shows its age in a few ways. Who knows, maybe some young firecracker will dust 'er off and update 'er for Craft...
